title: Replays not working
body:
Ever since the patch, I haven't been able to load any recorded replays (.lrf), and my friend can't either. Whenever I try, it opens to the champion loading screen, waits a bit, loads the names, and then that's as far as it goes. No champion portraits. just usernames, background image, the champion boxes [the red box] and then it sits there. Is there any reason for this?

Tried using replay.gg and all I got was a bug splat for every replay.

If it helps, at the bottom of the replay, it shows Client 6.13 =S

Thanks!
